title: QS Wall Sans Font - Light
content:

I try to mach between tow style..
author: Qassim

comments.content:
What are your suggestions ?

[qassim haider]  
qalligraphiy.net/fla/  
sense of calligraphy

Distinctive, clever, and well-formed.  
I feel the upper end of the c goes down just a little too far.  
Where the arm of the k meets the stem, try putting the narrowing bend of the outline on top of the stroke and not the bottom.
can you explain to me with sample of pictures

This should make my meaning clear:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140714000949im_/http:/typophile.com/files/qw_ck_5769.png)
  
You may disagree, of course.
Looks like you modified this from House Chalet 1960.

cerulean  
Thank you very much,'ll show you the result soon.

--

SuperUltraFabulous  
 [http://www.identifont.com/samples/houseindustries/ChaletLondon1960.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20140714000949/http:/www.identifont.com/samples/houseindustries/ChaletLondon1960.gif "http://www.identifont.com/samples/houseindustries/ChaletLondon1960.gif")  
Perhaps, but not much...
